content: व्रजः [व्रज्-घञर्थे क] {@--1@} A multitude, collection, flock, group; नेत्रव्रजाः पौरजनस्य तास्मिन् विहाय सर्वान्नृपतीन्निपेतुः <ls>R. 6. 7</ls>; <ls n="R.">7. 60</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 6</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">14. 33.</ls> {@--2@} A station of cowherds. {@--3@} A cow-pen, cow-shed; <ls>Śi. 2. 64.</ls> {@--4@} An abode, a resting-place. {@--5@} A road. {@--6@} A cloud. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a district near Mathurā. --जं Wandering, going.
